mapbox-gl-accessibility.description: Integrates with ARIA-compatible screen readers for users with visual impairments.

mapbox-gl-boundaries.description: Enables users to show/hide disputed borders.

maplibre-gl-compare.description: Enables users to compare two maps by swiping left and right.

mapbox-gl-controls.description: Adds controls for a ruler, style inspector, localization, and style switcher.

mapbox-gl-directions.description: Adds a control to allow users to plot driving, walking, and cycling directions on the map.

mapbox-gl-draw.description: Adds support for drawing and editing features on maps.

mapbox-gl-elevation.description: Adds a control to retrieve altitude from terrain RGB tilesets.

maplibre-gl-export.description: Adds a control that exports the map as a PDF or images such as PNG, JPEG and SVG.

mapbox-gl-infobox.description: Adds a control to display an infobox or a gradient.

mapbox-gl-legend.description: Adds a control that shows a legend generated from the map style.

mapbox-gl-style-switcher.description: Adds a control to switch between styles.

mapboxgl-minimap.description: Adds a control to show a miniature overview of the current map.

maplibre-gl-temporal-control.description: Temporal Controller plugin for MapLibre GL JS. [demo](https://kanahiro.github.io/maplibre-gl-temporal-control/raster.html).

mapbox-gl-valhalla.description: Adds a control to provide isochrone features from valhalla server.

mapbox.photon.description: Adds a control to provide a geocoding feature from Photon API.

maplibre-gl-basemaps.description: A plugin for switching between raster basemaps.

maplibre-gl-measures.description: A plugin for taking measures on the map.

mapbox-gl-language.description: Automatically localizes the map into the userâ€™s language.

mapbox-gl-traffic.description: Hide and show traffic layers on your map with an optional toggle button.

L7.description: Adds large-scale WebGL-powered geospatial data visualization framework.

flowmap.blue.description: Render a geographic flow map visualization from a spreadsheet published on Google Sheets.

mapbox-gl-arcgis-featureserver.description: A library for retrieving features from an ArcGIS FeatureServer or MapServer. This library makes tiled requests rather than simply requesting every feature.

mapbox-gl-esri-sources.description: A library for making it easier to use Esri services in MapLibre GL JS. Supports Esri Map Services (dynamic & tiled), Esri Vector Tile Services & Esri Vector Basemap Styles.

pmtiles.description: A library for retrieving tiles from single-file, cloud-storage-optimized PMTiles archives, which don't require running a server or API.

simplespec-to-gl-style.description: Converts GeoJSON styles with ["simplestyle-spec"](https://github.com/mapbox/simplestyle-spec/) to a MapLibre GL Style.

mapbox-gl-supported.description: Determines if the current browser supports MapLibre GL JS.

mapbox-choropleth.description: Create a choropleth layer from a CSV source and a geometry source.

mapbox-gl-utils.description: Manage layers, sources, and properties with syntactic sugar and convenience functions.

maplibregl-mapbox-request-transformer.description: This library provides a request transforming function enabling the consumption of MapboxGL Styles in MapLibreGL.

font-maker.description: A web app to convert fonts into fontstacks for use in MapLibre GL.

maplibre-gl-inspect.description: Adds an inspect control to view vector source features and properties.

mapbox-gl-fps.description: A frames-per-seconds GUI control and measurer with statistic report output.

mapbox-gl-framerate.description: A frame rate control to evaluate map rendering performance.
